mtte.authenticationTimeout: Sorry. You took too long to authenticate yourself (2 minutes). Close this window and try again.
mtte.authorURLToolTip: URL to author page in which the image is shown. Moulinette respects copyrights and would eventually contact the author.
mtte.availableAssets: Previews of matching assets available on Moulinette Cloud
mtte.bingSearch: Search provided by Microsoft Bing engine
mtte.browse: Browse folders and select an icon
mtte.clearFavoritesContent: Are you sure you want to empty this list? Items in other lists (tabs) will NOT be deleted.
mtte.clipboardImageSuccess: Image path successfully copied into clipboard!
mtte.clipboardImageToolTip: Copy path into clipboard. You can then reuse elsewhere.
mtte.clipboardSoundSuccess: Sound path successfully copied into clipboard!
mtte.configBingKeyHint: You have to provide your own Bing Search API key. Check documentation for more details
mtte.configBrowseModeHint: Depending on your preferences, you can choose to browse by creator or by pack (default)
mtte.configCustomPathHint: Specify a custom path (in addition to /moulinette) where moulinette must search for assets (during indexing)
mtte.configDebugScanAssetsHint: When enabled, moulinette adds messages into the console log to let you debug the process of indexing assets.
mtte.configDefaultEffectRadiusHint: Default effect radius when dragging and dropping a sound on a scene
mtte.configEnableMoulinetteCloudHint: When disabled, moulinette modules will not request Moulinette Cloud servers for assets. Patreon integration and showcase content will be disabled. Don't disable unless you only want to rely on local assets.
mtte.configFavoriteKeyHint: Keybind for opening Moulinette Favorites UI
mtte.configFilepickerHint: Use Moulinette FilePicker (replaces the built-in one)
mtte.configS3Hint: If you have properly configured S3 AND want to use it for moulinette, specify the name of the bucket. Leave blank otherwise
mtte.configShowCaseHint: Some packs are providing showcase content. Uncheck to remove them from the available packs.
mtte.configShowVideoThumbHint: Tries to load a thumbnail for each video by looking for a matchin `webp` image. You may want to disable this feature if you don't have those images because it would result in a lot of errors in the console (fail to download).
mtte.configSoundboardColumnsHint: Number of shortcuts rendered on one row on the soundboard
mtte.configSoundboardHideUIHint: Hides the controls, navigation and logo when SoundBoard UI is opened. Improves the look-and-feel but could be annoying if you need both.
mtte.configSoundboardRowsHint: Number of rows on the soundboard
mtte.configUIModeHint: When choosing "compact", labels will be removed to save space. Useful for advanced GMs that want to optimize their workspace.
mtte.continue: The module waits for the authentication to be successfully completed. Check your browser (new tab) to follow the process. If the authentication failed, close this window and try again!
mtte.createArticleToolTip: Generates an article based on the image
mtte.createSceneToolTip: Click to create a scene from the image
mtte.createTileToolTip: Generates a tile and adds it to the current scene
mtte.customReferencesPacks: Packs available on Internet (you can download)
mtte.customReferencesToolTip: Moulinette provides a list of references (ex: free tokens available to download).
mtte.customSearchDescr: Search provided by Moulinette. Images provided by GM/admin.
mtte.deleteGroupContent: Please confirm that you really want to delete group '{group}'!
mtte.deletePlayListContent: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist Moulinette Soundboard?
mtte.discordIdToolTip: In case I need to contact you for additional information
mtte.downloadCoreSuccess: Translations successfully installed! You'll need to refresh your page!
mtte.downloadFailure: Something went bad. Report it to Moulinette Discord
mtte.downloadImageSuccess: Image successfully downloaded! Path copied into clipboard.
mtte.dragTile: Drag tile and drop it on your scene
mtte.dropasActorDescription: You are about to create a token from the dragged image. Choose the options below and confirm.
mtte.dropmodeDisabled: Drag & drop disabled. Please install submodule "Moulinette Tiles" to enable it
mtte.dropmodeToolTip: Choose what kind of asset will be generated
mtte.enterImageURLDescription: This feature lets you import an image from a URL (ex: Google Images). Moulinette has not been able to extract a valid image URL from your clipboard. Please specify it below.
mtte.errorAuthorImg: Please provide the author of the image
mtte.errorAuthorURL: Please provide the URL for the author of the image
mtte.errorBrowseUpdateModule: This view mode requires you to update the module.
mtte.errorBuildingAssetIndex: A data source (indexes) couldn't be loaded. See console for additional details!
mtte.errorChooseSlot: Choose a slot for the favorite
mtte.errorCreateTile: In order to create a tile, drag the image and drop it on the scene!
mtte.errorDoubleIconDefined: You must EITHER choose a Font Awesome icon OR a local image but not both!
mtte.errorDownload: Image couldn't be downloaded from website. Try again later!
mtte.errorDownloadTimeout: Website hosting the image didn't respond. Try again later!
mtte.errorDragDropRequirements: Drag & Drop capability requires submodule 'Moulinette Tiles'
mtte.errorEnterShortText: You must provide a short text
mtte.errorGMOnly: This interface is only for GMs.
mtte.errorGroupIdInvalid: Group ID may only contain alphanumeric characters (min/max 3/10 chars)!
mtte.errorGroupMaximum: You reached the maximum number of groups!
mtte.errorIconInvalid: Invalid icon! Consider using the picker
mtte.errorImageURL: Please provide the adress to the background image (URL)
mtte.errorInProgress: Moulinette is already active. Please wait!
mtte.errorLinkYourPatreon: You need to link Moulinette to Patreon first
mtte.errorNoBabele: You installed a translation for Babele BUT you don't have Babele installed or the module is NOT active
mtte.errorNoModule: It seems that only the core has been installed. Make sure that at least 1 Moulinette module has been installed and enabled.
mtte.errorSASTokenAboutToExpire: Your token will expire in {minutes} minutes. Relink your Patreon account to hide this message.
mtte.errorSASTokenExpired: Your token expired. Relink your Patreon to get access to Moulinette Cloud assets
mtte.errorSearchResult: Not able to drag this on the scene. Check console logs.
mtte.errorSelectAtLeastOne: Please check at least one element!
mtte.errorTooMany: You selected too many elements at once. Maximum 3.
mtte.errorUnexpected: Unexpected error from server. Check the logs!
mtte.exportAllHint: Determines if dependent assets from modules and systems should be exported too. If you check it, it will use more storage. If you leave it unchecked, your scenes might require modules/systems to be rendered properly.
mtte.exportCreatorHint: The creator is 'Moulinette Private' by default. You can change it.
mtte.exportErrorLogin: Please link your Patreon account with Moulinette to use that feature!
mtte.exportErrorPatron: Moulinette Cloud (private storage) is not available for you. It requires supporting Moulinette with tier "Dwarf Blacksmith" ($5/mo) or more.
mtte.exportPackHint: The name of the folder becomes the name of the pack.
mtte.exportWarning: Moulinette Cloud doesn't support tokens and notes. Tokens will be removed from the scenes during the process. Notes are kept but won't work if a journal article is attached.
mtte.exportWelcome: You are about to export all the scenes from the folder to Moulinette Cloud. Please carefully check the information below before processing!
mtte.favoriteCheckedToolTip: Creates a favorite which will play one of the selected sounds randomly.
mtte.favoriteDescr: This action will store the selected sound as favorite. Choose a slot and specify a short text or icon to be rendered. Any existing favorite will be overriden.
mtte.favoriteIconDescr: You can choose to display a Font Awesome icon OR browse and choose your own icon. If you don't choose any icon, the short text will be displayed.
mtte.favoriteSettingsDescription: Add/remove groups of favorites. Groups are sorted by ID (history always first)
mtte.filterBabeleToolTip: Include translations for compendiums (requires Babele module)
mtte.filterLangToolTip: Filter translations that match the currently selected language
mtte.filterModSysToolTip: Show only translations for the system and the modules you have installed and enabled
mtte.forgingFailure: Something went bad. Report it to Moulinette Discord
mtte.forgingGameIconsSuccess: Images were successfully downloaded! Path to folder was copied into your clipboard.
mtte.gameIconsDescription: Instructions : check all icons you want Moulinette to download.
mtte.giftWelcome: If you received a gift from a content creator, you can apply it here. If the coupon is valid, moulinette will list your gift and its benefits. A gift can provide you access to the creator's assets as if you would support him.
mtte.groupMacroHint: Macros that will be executed for this group IN ADDITION to the current ones
mtte.groupTileSizeHint: Apply the specified tile size for this group. Leave blank to use the current tile size (Tiles)
mtte.homeWelcome: Welcome! Moulinette gives you access to various items (scenes, images, icons, sounds, translations) that you can easily download without having to install separate modules.
mtte.howtoSoundsToolTip: Howto: how does it work? How to install new sounds.
mtte.howtoToolTip: Howto: how does it work? How to install new images/tiles.
mtte.imageSearchDescription: Instructions : search then click for action
mtte.imageURLToolTip: Provide a link to the image (direct link)
mtte.importSceneToolTip: Click to import the scene into your world
mtte.indexImagesToolTip: Moulinette will scan the custom folder and index all found images. You must re-index everytime the folder changes.
mtte.indexScenesToolTip: Moulinette will index scenes from local compendia. You must re-index every time compendia change.
mtte.indexSoundsToolTip: Moulinette will scan the custom folder and index all found sounds. You must re-index everytime the folder changes.
mtte.indexingInProgress: Moulinette is indexing your assets... please wait
mtte.learnMore: to learn more about Moulinette and/or support it.
mtte.moulinetteCloudDisabled: Moulinette Cloud is disabled in the settings. Patreon integration is part of Moulinette Cloud. Re-enable this configuration to get access to Patreon capabilities.
mtte.moveFavorite: Move favorite: do you want to overwrite?
mtte.moveFavoriteContent: You are moving '{from}' to an occupied slot ({to}). Do you want to overwrite (yes) the destination or swap (no) positions?
mtte.name: Name
mtte.noBingKey: In order to search images, you first need to configure Bing Search API key
mtte.noResult: No result found! Try with less terms or check your data.
mtte.noSoundPads: No soundpad is available to you. Check that your Patreon account is linked and that you support TableTop Audio!
mtte.notPatron: You are not yet supporting Moulinette. You won't be able to access any content from creators below
mtte.pasteURL: Import image from URL (and create article)
mtte.patreonDescription: You're not connected to Patreon yet. Click on the button below and authenticate with your Patron account.
mtte.patreonSupportMe: If you find this module useful, please consider supporting by becoming my patron.
mtte.patreonWelcome: Moulinette lets you link your world with your Patreon account. By doing so, Moulinette will offer you additional features and assets based on your subscriptions, not only to Moulinette itself but to others creators too.
mtte.pinSoundBoard: Keep soundboard open when playing sound
mtte.playCheckedToolTip: Creates a new playlist with the selected sounds and plays them.
mtte.prefabsDescription: Prefabs (requires Token Attacher module). Assets available on Moulinette Cloud only.
mtte.refreshed: Cached data cleared. Re-open moulinette to load new data!
mtte.runMacroToolTip: Executes macros (by name, comma-separated) after creating the tile/article/token. Macros can use 'game.moulinette.param' to access created asset.
mtte.saveCategoriesToolTip: Save categories on Moulinette Cloud (indexes shared by all users)
mtte.sceneDescToolTip: Helps finding the scene during a search
mtte.scenesDescription: Scenes currently available for Moulinette. See scenes list.
mtte.scribeActionToolTip: Install all checked translations, configure Babele, and reloads page
mtte.scribeWelcome: Instructions : check all the translations you want Moulinette to scribe for you.
mtte.search: Type something to search... then ENTER (or click button)
mtte.shareAgree1: I understand and agree that the scene data (JSON) will be made publicly on
mtte.shareAgree2: You still keeps the rights for it and can ask Moulinette to remove it.
mtte.shareAgree3: I understand that the image must be publicly available and will be downloaded everytime someone requests Moulinette to import the scene in his world. The author of the image must agree.
mtte.shareSuccess: The scene successfully shared with Moulinette. Thank you for your contribution!
mtte.shareWelcome: You are about to share a scene with the Moulinette community. After the review process, the scene will be made available to everyone.
mtte.showCase: This pack is a showcase for quickly and easily experimenting the "Tiles" module. To download more packs, visit . Read the documentation on how to bring and manage your assets.
mtte.showCaseAssets: There are {count} assets matching your criteria on Moulinette Cloud. Click to preview them.
mtte.showSoundPadsToolTip: Opens the SoundPad UI (populated from Moulinette Cloud)
mtte.slotNotAssigned: This slot has not been yet defined! Opening Moulintte Audio...
mtte.soundsDescription: Search provided by Moulinette. Soundtracks provided by GM/admin.
mtte.specialSearch: This pack contains no asset or requires you to provide search terms
mtte.specialSearchFailed: Something went wrong during the request/search
mtte.tilesDescription: Search provided by Moulinette. Check available packs for copyrights.
mtte.updateActionToolTip: Checks if there is any update for translations that you installed with Moulinette
mtte.updateContent: Moulinette will update the following {count} translation(s):
mtte.warnAnimatedAsset: Animated Images might not be supported for that field!
